expo.name: Travel planner
expo.description: This is a mobile trip planner application created for Comp3130.  This application allows you to select from a variety of locations and add existing or new activites to the locations to your wishlist to assist in planning trips. Intented plateform => Pixel 4XL (Andriod studio full name: Pixel 4XL API 30).  Intended operating system => Andriod 11.0x86 (Release name R). Intended oriantation => Portrait.  All information provided in the app is sample data. Any resemblance to actual persons, places or things, current, past or future, is entirely coincidental.
